name: Wrist Control
description: Basic hand-fighting to establish grips and off-balance.

name: Arm Drag
description: Pull the opponent’s arm across to expose the back or set up a shot.

name: Snapdown
description: Pull the head down to front headlock or mat return.

name: Slide By
description: Redirect collar-tie/inside-tie to an angle for back or double.

name: Collar Tie / Inside Tie
description: Wrestling tie-ups to control posture and entries.

name: Level Change
description: Fundamental motion to shoot safely and efficiently.

name: Sprawl
description: Hip drop and legs back to defend shots.

name: Pummeling
description: Drill to win underhooks/inside control.

name: Underhook
description: Arm inside the opponent’s, control to set up throws/shots.

name: Overhook (Whizzer)
description: Counter to underhook and transition to throws.

name: Russian Tie (2-on-1)
description: Two-on-one arm control leading to back takes and trips.

name: Head Positioning
description: Dominate with forehead pressure and angles.

name: Shooting Entries
description: Penetration step for singles, doubles and knee taps.

name: Double Leg Takedown
description: Penetration step, head tight, drive across or cut corner.

name: Single Leg Takedown
description: Clasp the leg, run the pipe, trip, or treetop finish.

name: Body Lock Takedown
description: Clinch lift or trip from rear or front body lock.

name: Inside Trip (Uchi Mata style)
description: Hook inside thigh while off-balancing.

name: Outside Trip (Osoto style)
description: Block outside leg and drive them backward.

name: Back Body Lock Trip (Mat Return)
description: Trip return when behind the opponent.

name: Duck Under to Back Take
description: Clear the arm and get to the back; mat return finish.

name: Hip Toss (Head-and-Arm / Harai-like)
description: Load on hip; throw via head-and-arm or lapel.

name: Ankle Pick
description: Snap or post, pick the ankle and drive.

name: Knee Tap
description: Underhook to knee tap for easy finish.

name: High Crotch / Tree Top
description: Lift the single and kick out the post leg.

name: Fireman’s Carry
description: Arm drag or high-crotch style shoulder carry.

name: Suplex (Mat Return)
description: Lift and return—sport safety emphasis.

name: Foot Sweeps (Ashi-waza)
description: Classic judo-style reaps and foot sweeps.

name: Closed Guard: Knee-in-Tailbone Break
description: Knee wedges tailbone; posture to open guard.

name: Closed Guard: Standing Break
description: Stand, posture, open with elbow/knee wedge.

name: Closed Guard: Double Forearm Wedge
description: Stack and wedge forearms to open.

name: Closed Guard: Hip Control + Elbow Wedge
description: Pin the hips; elbow wedges knee line.

name: Closed Guard: Can Opener (caution)
description: Neck crank opener; illegal in many rule sets.

name: Half Guard Top: Crossface + Knee Slice
description: Smash half guard and slice the knee through.

name: Half Guard Top: Backstep Pass
description: Backstep to reverse-kesa or side control.

name: Half Guard Top: Twist Pass
description: Weave the arm and twist hips through.

name: Half Guard Top: Tripod Smash
description: Head-and-hip tripod to free the knee line.

name: Half Guard Top: Knee Pry + Hip Kickout
description: Pry knees apart and kick free to pass.

name: Mount: Bridge and Roll (Upa)
description: Trap arm/leg; bridge and roll to guard.

name: Mount: Elbow (Shrimp) Escape
description: Frame and shrimp to recover half/guard.

name: Mount: Knee-to-Elbow Combo
description: Sequence elbow-knee to half/guard.

name: Mount: Foot Drag Escape
description: Drag foot to trap and shrimp out.

name: Mount: Trap & Bridge High Mount
description: Trap an arm high and bridge.

name: Mount: Ghost Escape
description: Frame, shoulder walk and backdoor slide.

name: Open Guard: Torreando (Bullfighter) Pass
description: Grip pants; step around and cut in.

name: Open Guard: Leg Drag Entry
description: Pin shins, drag legs to one side to pass.

name: Open Guard: X-Pass
description: Step-over pass with hip switch.

name: Open Guard: Tripod Push + Backstep
description: Tripod pressure then backstep clear.

name: Open Guard: Shin Pin Pass
description: Pin shin with knee and slice.

name: De La Riva: Backstep Escape
description: Backstep over hook to clear DLR.

name: Spider Guard: Posture + Elbow Peel
description: Break sleeve control and retract.

name: Lasso Guard: Strip Sleeve + Backstep
description: Clear lasso and backstep to smash.

name: Butterfly Guard: Float & Smash
description: Low hips, win head/underhook to flatten.

name: X / SLX: Push Foot Off Hip
description: Clear foot from hip and kick free.

name: Rear Naked Choke
description: Figure-four strangle from the back.

name: Guillotine Choke
description: Front head control strangle; many guards.

name: Armbar
description: Hyperextend elbow with hips.

name: Triangle Choke
description: Figure-four legs around neck/arm.

name: Arm Triangle
description: Head-and-arm strangle from top.

name: D’Arce Choke
description: Brabo/D’Arce from front head or half.

name: Anaconda Choke
description: Roll-through front headlock strangle.

name: Kimura
description: Figure-four reverse shoulder lock.

name: Americana (Keylock)
description: Figure-four top shoulder lock.

name: Omoplata
description: Shoulder lock using legs.

name: Ezekiel (Sode Guruma Jime)
description: Sleeve-based forearm choke.

name: North-South Choke
description: Head isolated under chest in N/S.

name: Von Flue Choke
description: Counter to stubborn guillotine from top.

name: Bulldog Choke
description: Headlock style strangle from turtle/stand.

name: Twister
description: Spinal lock from truck/backside 50/50.

name: Neck Crank
description: Cervical crank variants; often illegal.

name: Straight Ankle Lock
description: Achilles lock from ashi/SLX.

name: Heel Hook
description: Rotational knee/ankle lock; rules vary.

name: Toe Hold
description: Figure-four foot twist.

name: Kneebar
description: Leg hyperextension attack.

name: Calf Slicer
description: Compression lock behind the knee.

name: Peruvian Necktie
description: Front headlock sit-through choke.

name: North-South Kimura Trap
description: Kimura control to finish/transition.

name: Hip Bump Sweep
description: Sit up, post and bump to mount.

name: Scissor Sweep
description: Collar-sleeve, chop shin and pull to mount.

name: Flower (Pendulum) Sweep
description: Underhook leg and swing to mount.

name: Lumberjack Sweep
description: Grab ankles when opponent stands.

name: Waiter/Muscle Sweep
description: Underhook foot; elevate and tip.

name: 100% Sweep
description: Head/arm wrap to sweep.

name: Omoplata Sweep
description: Use omoplata setup to roll through.

name: Half Guard: Old School Sweep
description: Deep underhook to kick out base.

name: Half Guard: John Wayne Sweep
description: Hip switch and knee lever.

name: Half Guard: Pendulum
description: Leg swing from half to come on top.

name: Half Guard: Foot Grab Sweep
description: Control far foot and roll.

name: Butterfly Hook Sweep
description: Underhook/overhook elevate to top.

name: De La Riva Sweep
description: Off-balance with DLR hooks and grips.

name: Tripod Sweep
description: Foot to hip/ankle combo; sit them down.

name: Tomahawk Sweep
description: Knee cut counter; swing leg through.

name: Closed Guard (Full Guard)
description: Legs closed around opponent; attack hub.

name: Half Guard (Bottom)
description: One leg trapped around opponent’s leg.

name: Butterfly Guard
description: Inside hooks sitting guard.

name: Spider Guard
description: Sleeve + foot-in-bicep control (Gi).

name: Lasso Guard
description: Loop leg over arm to trap (Gi).

name: De La Riva Guard
description: Outside hook around shin with sleeve/pant grips.

name: Single-Leg X (Ashi Garami)
description: Leg entanglement controlling near hip.

name: X-Guard
description: Two underhooks with inside elevation.

name: Side Control (Top)
description: Chest-to-chest pin across hips/shoulders.

name: Mount (Top)
description: Knees tight beside torso; dominant pin.

name: Back Mount
description: Hooks and seatbelt; supreme control.
